select count(distinct create_by) from up_patch
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(update_time)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) <= date(update_time) and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) > date(update_time)
and merge_package_flag != 'Y' and del_flag != 'Y'

select projectId, projectName, lastUpgradeTime, patchFileName, COUNT(projectId) oneMonthUpgrade from ( select u.project_id projectId, up.project_name projectName, u.update_time lastUpgradeTime, u.patch_file_name patchFileName from up_patch u inner join up_project up ON u.project_id = up.project_id and up.del_flag != 'Y'
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(u.update_time) and u.patch_status = '80' and u.del_flag != 'Y' and u.merge_package_flag IN ('N', 'Y')
order by u.update_time desc ) u group by projectId order by lastUpgradeTime desc

select up.project_id projectId, COUNT(u.project_id) published from up_patch u inner join up_project up ON u.project_id = up.project_id and up.del_flag != 'Y'
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(u.update_time) and u.patch_status in ('15', '80') and u.del_flag != 'Y' and u.merge_package_flag != 'Y'
group by u.project_id

select DATE_FORMAT(upt.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as timestamp, DATE_FORMAT(upt.update_time,'%d') as day, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(upt.update_time,'%m'),'月',DATE_FORMAT(upt.update_time,'%d')) as time, count(1) as count from up_patch upt where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) <= date(update_time) and upt.del_flag != 'Y' and upt.patch_status in ('15', '80') and upt.merge_package_flag != 'Y' group by timestamp order by timestamp
